p: Double-stranded DNA viruses , Herpes simplex virus 1 and 2 (HSV-1 and HSV-2), are members of the Î±-herpesvirus subfamily of Herpesviridae family that infect humans. HSV-1 causes cold sores, while HSV-2 causes genital herpes and these viruses can establish lifelong latent infection within peripheral nervous system (Dai and Zhou 2018).
